backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing updated text‑color–related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and styling focus of each frontend component.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and CSS variable definitions for light/dark theme color tokens and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component composing all site sections and the mobile CTA bar.
Mobile-only sticky call bar that appears after scrolling and links to phone contact.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section featuring phone CTA, service hours, area details, and styled info cards.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, quick contact links, service list, and branding elements.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive header with scroll‑reactive styling, navigation links, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, CTA buttons, and quick info cards for towing services.
frontend/src/components/PhotosSection.ts: Displays a gallery of towing service photos using a responsive grid of image cards.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreaSecti: Shows service coverage details for Nellore with descriptive content and a list of covered areas.
Lists available towing services with icons and descriptions plus a call‑to‑action section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, global styles, and shared layout utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color tokens, custom radii, shadows, fonts, and keyframes for UI styling.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, and pending requests for the PMK Towing Service project.
